name: Chris Michael
text: This location has one guy running the show. He is very fast. Awesome guy. Pizza was excellent. This guy deserves way more than he is making I'm sure.

text: I NEVER write reviews, but this is truly a one man show - and by man I mean WOMAN. This wonderful black woman is literally working the dinner rush on her own with a smile on her face and so much optimism. She calls me (and all her …More

text: This store is much better!! They were very helpful and were fast on making the correct pizza's.  I will only come to this store for now on!! Great staff and pizza!!

name: Julia
text: This location is a great example on how diseases are spread. If I could give "0" stars I would! I went in today and there was a guy and girl standing right outside the door smoking. I proceeded inside and the young woman followed. She …More

text: If I could give this place 0 stars, I would.  I've only stopped by twice, but on both occasions, the establishment was closed early (8:30ish), and as I walked from my car to the front door, a pleasantly plump gentleman smugly shook his head …More

name: Linda Walden
text: We never have someone pick up the phone to place a pickup order! This is the only Little Ceasar in our area. They always have 5.00 pizza,but no time to place a special order..

text: THEY ARE ALWAYS OUT OF FOOD!! Twice now my husband has gone around 7:30 pm (hours before closing time) and they have either not had crazy bread or deep deep dish pizzas and don't even offer to make more ... just say "we're out"
